title: tokyohd
author: tokyohd
content: According to a recent announcement, Input Output has released Cardano node 1.35.0.The leading Cardano developer says that the release of the node is an “important milestone” on the road to the Vasil hard fork.The team of developers is now preparing for the release of the Cardano testnet. The testnet update proposal will be submitted as soon as 75% of all stake pool operators get on board, thus ensuring the required level of chain density.As reported by U.Today, the Vasil hard fork was originally scheduled to launch in late June, but it has since been postponed. According to the updated schedule, it is now expected to happen in late July. Details: https://u.today/cardano-reaches-important-milestone-on-road-to-vasil-upgrade

comments.author: FrozenBit
comments.body: I'm not sure if the next update will be more positive for Cardano. Honestly, after much going through, I still expect the ecosystem to grow more than the competitors seem to be. Their position in this space needs to be exposed through more products. Hopefully, the bear market period does not make them abandon their ecosystem development plans, although it can be admitted that the fact that attraction is very unlikely at this time, looking at the long-term existence of Cardano, but the past year is well worth celebrating in this space.
